item.description:
GOLF 101 for New Golfers & GOLF 102 Playing Lessons -Professional Lessons less than $17 per Hour

Have some fun and stay healthy while you enjoy fresh air and new friends.
Golf makes exercise challenging and fun – enjoy the health benefits and social activity that Golfing can provide


 

 

Discount Golf Lessons ( http://www.DiscountGolfCT.com  ) starts the fifth year with the GOLF 101 and GOLF 102 series – which has already had over 600 graduates in the first 4 years!

Why are GOLF 101 and GOLF 102 so popular? The answer is simple – GOLF 101 and GOLF 102 gives you 6 hours of high quality hand-on golfing instruction in a small class size for only $100 – which includes clubs and all fees and equipment. Compare Golf 101 at less than $17 per hour to lessons from a Golf Pro that can cost you $50 - $80 per hour – and the answer is obvious. The flexible schedule lets you choose any 3 lesson dates and times to accommodate the busiest golfer.

Students can mix and match any date to customize their schedule. Golf 101 lessons are $150 at the golf course if any spaces remain, the discounted price of $100 is available online only.

After you purchase your spot in GOLF 101 or GOLF 102, you will be emailed all the available date for you to choose your 3 lesson dates, and then you are emailed a confirmation and some Golf Lesson information.

GOLF 101 is designed for both the New Golfer who wants to improve their golf game, and anyone who is picking up the golf club for the first time – and wants to try the competitive and challenging game of golf without having to make large cash investment in clubs and lessons.

You are taught putting, chipping, rules, etiquette, and plenty of work at the driving range. Video Swing Analysis is included to help you perfect this game of champions.

GOLF 102 takes you out on the golf course for playing lessons as you play on a team Scramble Tournament style – to give you experience and help you play better than your buddies – and be the hero at your Company Golf Tournament!

So how does the GOLF 101 and GOLF 102 Certified Teaching Professional George Claffey stack up against those expensive Golfing Pros? In 2010, George Claffey was recognized By The United States Golf Teachers Federation as one of the top 100 Certified Golf Teaching Professional in the WORLD – the ONLY Instructor to be awarded this honor in Connecticut!

**JUST ADDED – GOLF TUNE-UP LESSONS - Improve your Putting, Chipping, and Golfing Skills with GOLF TUNE UP

- the perfect way to get ready for Golf Season

Golf Tune Up starts you off with putting & chipping lessons with our Award Winning Golf Instructor, and takes you on the Course for 9 holes of playing lessons in a scramble style tournament

*Golf Tune Up Lessons –Only $50 ADV TIX DISCOUNT

Classes Start Saturday March 31 2012 from 9am to noon

***Have some fun and stay healthy while you enjoy fresh air and new friends. Golf makes exercise challenging and fun – enjoy the health benefits and social activity that Golfing can provide.***

"DiscountGolfCT.com * Quality Hands On Golf Lessons for Less Than $17 per Hour *** FREE 9 Holes Of Golf (while Supplies Last)***

*Classes Fill Up Quickly – Reserve Your Spot Today

 

Lesson are held at:

Miner Hills Golf Course and Driving Range
80 Miner Hills Dr
Middletown, CT 06457

Exit 20 off 91 (Country Club Road Exit)

10 Minutes From Hartford * 15 Minutes from New Haven

 

GOLF 101:

Sundays -3:30pm to 5:30pm (held every Sunday)

Wednesdays  -5:30pm to 7:30pm (held every Wednesday)

 

GOLF 102

Mondays

5:30pm to 7:30pm - Golf until dark for FREE (held every Monday)

 

GOLF TUNE UP LESSONS

Saturdays 9am to Noon (held every Saturday)

 

***GIVE THE GIFT OF GOLF - GIFT CERTIFICATES ARE AVAILABLE***

 

*** Classes Fill Up Quickly – Reserve your GOLF TUNE UP, GOLF 101 and GOLF 102 lessons before class space is filled ***

 

Visit http://www.DiscountGolfCT.com  or call (860) 436-9449
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the Club House - our instructor will be wearing a white www.CTGolfTips.com hat
